Actors: Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart, Valerie Mahaffey, Delphi Harrington
Writer: Todd Komarnicki, Chesley Sullenberger (based on the book "Highest Duty" by), Jeffrey Zaslow (based on the book "Highest Duty" by)
Title: Sully
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 33 nominations.
Plot: The story of Chesley Sullenberger, an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.
